sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import ProductAPI from '../API/ProductAPI'; import Image from '../Share/img/Image'; import convertMoney from '../convertMoney'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home(props) { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); //Fetch Product useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await ProductAPI.getAPI(); console.log(response); const data = response.splice(0, 8); setProducts(data); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
{products && products.map((value) => (
{/* Để tắt modal phải có class="close" và data-dissmiss="modal" và aria-label="Close" */} ×

{value.name}

{convertMoney(value.price)} VND

{value.short_desc}

View Detail
))}

New Inspiration 2020

20% off on new season

Browse collections

Carefully created collections

Browse our categories

Made the hard way

Top trending products

{products && products.map((value) => (
    {/*
    • */} {/*
  • Add to cart
    • */}
{value.name}

{convertMoney(value.price)} VND

))}
Free shipping

Free shipping worlwide

24 x 7 service

Free shipping worlwide

Festival offer

Free shipping worlwide

Let's be friends!
); } export default Home;
